features.featureTitle: In the Logo Concept Generator form at XPath /html[1]/body[1]/div[1]/div[1]/div[1]/div[1]/main[1]/div[1]/div[1]/form[1], ensure a clearly visible 'Generate Logo Concept' submit button is present at the bottom of the form. The button must be styled consistently with the app's gold accent theme, be prominently labeled (e.g., 'Generate Logo Concept' or 'Generate Logo'), and trigger the logo concept generation and 10-variant logo showcase when clicked.
